text.section: Each year, no later than 60 days before the General Assembly convenes for its regular session, the Department shall submit a report to the Governor.

The annual report shall include:
a summary and description of the nature of every section of the State Development Plan that has been:
added, deleted, or revised since the last annual report; and
filed by the Governor under § 5-605 of this title;
a summary of each important study wholly or partly completed by the Department since the last annual report; and
summaries of the work of the Department and of the State Economic Growth, Resource Protection, and Planning Commission.
The Department shall make copies of the annual report available for general distribution or sale.
